pageTitle: Life goes on (85mm f/1.4g shot): Nikon SLR Lens Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   Ray My blog: http://www.rritchie.com/wordpress I was expecting the image to be softer than this at f/11, because of diffraction, and was pleasantly surprised with the result. I will probably shoot this lens a lot more at small apertures for detail work, so that I have a more depth of field to work with. I'm continuing to give my new lens a workout
